***UPDATED APRIL 2016***

Recurring income businesses are the Holy Grail, yet many people don’t realize how easy they can be to create. Discover how to simply build a passive income stream that pays you monthly in a niche YOU’RE excited about.

Create Passive Income With The Power Of Repeat Buyers That Pay You Monthly!

  • Develop a recurring income business using the simplest, fastest model in existence
  • See why people will gladly pay you each month for simply writing about a topic you love
  • Forget needing complicated software or programming skills to achieve passive income


Brilliant Business Model - Fred Ferguson

I loved this course because this newsletter business model will work brilliantly with my SAAS products which are also billed monthly. Brian, Mark and Shane are excellent instructors and the course is all in as far as content goes so I highly recommend it. If you’re reading this I’m thinking you probably need it.

Simple Newsletter + Traffic = YOUR Formula For Repeat, Passive Profits

Discover a niche that you’re both excited about AND has huge profit potential. Then tap into a hungry audience that wants more, and is happy to pay for it every single month!

We’ll show you how to pick a winning niche, create your newsletters, and get in front of a huge targeted audience. You’ll find out how to automate delivery and payment for a truly passive income, all while building a tangible business asset worth thousands.

You’ll see how to set-up simple, high converting pages for your offer. And exactly how to drive targeted visitors into your funnel to maximize profits.

See how to source quality traffic for free and at very limited cost. When you’re ready to scale up or move on, you’ll know how to make the maximum profit from this virtually hands free business.

What Makes This Course Unique?

Learn from a team of 3 instructors who run their own, highly profitable membership site.
Tap into expert, step by step instruction in each of their areas of expertise:

Content creation from an expert who provides consulting services to international companies.

Sales funnel and traffic strategies from a top level online marketer.

Email marketing and free traffic methods from a highly paid email marketer and traffic consultant.

When it comes to creating YOUR passive recurring newsletter business, you’re in great hands, with a team of three instructors who are doing this themselves.

You’ll come out of this course with an EXACT model to follow to create your very own, passive income business.
title: Passive Income: Monthly Subscription Newsletter Profits
instructors: Shane Farrell, Brian Gray, Mark Tandan
